alert.note: Alert for Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 10 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pecos County through 815 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 26 miles south of McCamey, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bakersfield and Girvin. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 286 and 306. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
